name: oura
title: Oura
description: Get data from your Oura ring experience to keep track of your readiness, sleep, activity, and more.
author: Rob

commands.name: index
commands.title: Get Oura Personal Info
commands.description: Get your latest personal info from Oura like your age, weight, and height.

commands.name: summary
commands.title: Oura Summary
commands.description: Get your Sleep, Readiness, and Activity scores

commands.name: workouts
commands.title: Latest Oura Workouts
commands.description: Get your latest workouts from Oura like your activity type, start time, and duration.

commands.name: readiness
commands.title: Oura Readiness
commands.description: Get today's readiness data: activity balance, temperature, HRV, resting heart rate, and sleep balance.

commands.name: sleep
commands.title: Oura Sleep
commands.description: Get your sleep data: score, total sleep, REM sleep, deep sleep, and latency.

commands.name: activity
commands.title: Oura Activity
commands.description: Get your today's activity data: like steps, calories, and distance.

preferences.title: Oura Personal Access Token
preferences.name: oura_token
preferences.description: Your personal access token from the Oura API.

preferences.title: Unit of Measurement
preferences.name: unit_measurement
preferences.description: The unit of measurement to use for the data.
